name: her body unswept by laughter.
description:
discography of a rose: an essay in linearity // botanist notations as an act of love // anatomy as a (of a ) hieroglyph . 

made for WOWIE JAM 2.0

this was my first game jam!!!! wooooo!! sorry it's such a mess, i know there's (unintentional) bugs and it could be so much cleaner and better all around, but honestly i'm just stoked to be able to say i did it! it's rough but it's a start :)

{ }
